price: ប្រភពទឹកដែលខ្ញុំរបស់អល់ឡោះនឹងទទួលទានវានៅក្នុង ឋានសួគ៌ ពួកគេអាចប្រើប្រាស់វាតាមចំណង់ចិត្ដ។
arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ʿaynan yashrabu bihā ʿibādu al-lahi yufajjirūnahā tafjīran
